title: Matchmaking Normals
body:
Hello there,

for a long time i have my personal issues with the Matchmakingsystem. It seems to be, from time to time, fairly unfair to me.

First, i measure "fairness" in "How many games everyone has played.". Players around 100 games should be similar strenght and a player with 1000 games or more should be stronger, just because he has more experience with the Champion he plays, the matchups and the game in general, right?

Example a game i just had (luckly my Team won so i didnt get 9x reports, maybe just 4 ....)

I played first time Irelia vs Humans, had some games vs Bots to have at least a feeling for the skills etc.

I have around 110 normal wins and 300+ aram wins and i am silver 5 (what is to be expected).
The average of normal wins in the game was 508 (3 player with 200 wins and 1 with over 1000, the rest around 500) with a dia 5 and gold 4 in the enemy team and my team "only silver".
Thats like the other extreme game where i got a plat3 as enemy when i had a lvl 27  (!!!) acc and the avg wins was around 300. 

How the heck can that happen? 
Is it the time? The game started around 22:10. Are there not enough player in my spectrum of "strenght" online to have a balanced game? The game popped after 1 min queue time for me. I wouldnt mind to wait 3-4 or more minutes to have a balanced game, where i dont feel like wasting 20 minutes fighting a uphill battle with the constant "omg noob" "uninstall" "report" and offensive language everyone experienced. That is not fun for me.

Or is it that this account is pretty old? i made it in 2012 got it to lvl 20 and then stopped until i started league again this year.

I want to know, if it is an exeption or it happens frequently to everyone and how to avoid it.

replies.body:
Bsp.:

Spieler 1: 500 Normals --> Bronze 1
Spieler 2: 500 Normals --> Silber 2
Spieler 3 300 Normals --> Dia 4
Spieler 4 300 Normals --> Silber 4

Der skill eines Spielers hat nichts mit der Anzahl an normals zu tun.. die einen lernen schneller aus ihren Fehlern bzw. lernen einige nie draus.

I also want to know something. Do you realize that you are in the german forum?

I think that it happens frequently since the ranked elo and the amount of normal wins does not influance the normal matchmaking
